answers.answer: You should talk to your Doctor about the swelling can be a sign of preeclampsia. As for shoes with swelling eh I have wide get so I wear doctor scholls wide width super comfy and nice shoes. The slip on sketchers shoes not sure they are as popular now but but they were just slip on often with fur around the ankle abd a thick sole. They always fit my wide get well.
Love sketches! I wore them for my firdt pregnancy and I worked then.so friggin commfy. Slip on ones with no laces!

question: Hey ladies! I'm having a hard time finding shoes that fit. I'm 19 wks and my feet are swelling up. Are there any good shoes out there? I haven't found anything yet. Please help!
title: Help I need shoes, that fit!
